project_abstract.cdata: The Container Transport Project aims at facilitating inland penetration of seaborne containers from gateway ports to inland cities, thus contributing to reducing economic disparities between coastal and inland areas. There are two main components in this project. First, Inland Container Depot (ICD) development aims at developing container handling capability at selected inland cities located along two pilot corridors. The Bank will finance qualified ICDs for their construction and the procurement of equipment. Second, upgrading Tianjin Port container handling capacity will extend financial assistance to the upgrading of container handling equipment at Tianjin Harbor Container Company, and providing technical assistance to establish a better operational and institutional environment for container operations.

P003653.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>集装箱运输项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目旨在促进海运集装箱从门户港口向内陆城市渗透，从而推动缩小沿海和内陆地区之间的经济差距。本项目设有两大子项目：（1）内陆集装箱中转站建设子项目，其宗旨是在两个试点走廊沿线的选定内陆城市提升集装箱吞吐量。世行将资助有资质的内陆集装箱中转站进行建设和采购设备；（2）天津港集装箱吞吐量提升子项目。本子项目将提供资金援助，用于升级天津港集装箱码头有限公司的装卸设备，同时将提供技术援助，为集装箱业务营造更好的运营和制度环境。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
